# The `GCOVFile` Class Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/gcovfile">GCOVFile</a> - Collects coverage information for one pair of coverage file (.gcno and .gcda). <a href="#details">More...</a>
